Summary: still occuring, looks like a star but it moves dramaticly
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
divs: Sighting Detailsthis thing has beem looping, diving, climbing and seemingly splitting in two briefly since at least 1 am. it is now 2:30 and if you get this in time, you should still see it. if the left most star of orions belt was the number 3 on a clock, this thing is moving between 7-10. the movements are no possible as far as i know with our technology. i cant record it because my neighbors garage light is too bright for the camera to pick up on it. i have had 7 people go out and look, all agree it's not my imagination. we have been staring at it for a while and are all seeing the same movements. this is not an optical illusion.
